original: 東海郡郯縣人，王元姬之弟。通經學，又興學校，推廣儒學五經。雖是西晉外戚權貴，但剛正守法，不曾踰矩弄權。
text: A native of Tanxian County, Donghai County, the younger brother of Wang Yuanji. General Confucianism, and Xing Xing schools, promote Confucianism Five Classics. Although he was a powerful relative in the Western Jin Dynasty, he was just abiding by the law and never went beyond the rules to gain power.
